question: Which Indian wrestler has been ranked world No. 1 rank in 65 Kg category?
explanation: Star Indian wrestler Bajrang Punia has recently touched a new high in his career by achieving the World number one rank in the 65kg category. He was placed atop the ranking table with 96 points in the United World Wrestling (UWW) list. The UWW is the international governing body for the sport of amateur wrestling. Its duties include overseeing wrestling at the Olympics. Bajrang has won five medals this season, including Common Wealth Games and the Asian Games gold and a silver at the World Championship in Budapest.  Bajrang was also the only Indian grappler to be given a seeding at the Budapest World Championship.
